title: 30 killed in tribal clashes near gold mine in Papua New Guinea, security forces granted 'emergency powers'
content: Clashes between rival tribes over a disputed gold mine in Papua New Guinea have left at least 30 dead. Police have been given emergency powers, including lethal force authorisation, to restore order. The Porgera gold mine has halted operations due to the violence, and measures like an alcohol ban and curfew are being enforced.
summary: Clashes between rival tribes over a disputed gold mine in Papua New Guinea have left at least 30 dead. Police have been given emergency powers, including lethal force authorisation, to restore order. The Porgera gold mine has halted operations due to the violence, and measures like an alcohol ban and curfew are being enforced.

title: Did Lester Holt say Trump deserved to be shot at? Here's the whole truth
content: MSNBC's Lester Holt has been criticized for seemingly suggesting that Donald Trump deserved a recent assassination attempt. Holt connected the incident to baseless claims made by Trump and JD Vance about Haitian immigrants in Springfield, Ohio. These unfounded allegations have led to bomb threats against Haitians, despite originating from unverified sources.
summary: MSNBC's Lester Holt has been criticized for seemingly suggesting that Donald Trump deserved a recent assassination attempt. Holt connected the incident to baseless claims made by Trump and JD Vance about Haitian immigrants in Springfield, Ohio. These unfounded allegations have led to bomb threats against Haitians, despite originating from unverified sources.

title: Ex-BBC anchor Huw Edwards avoids jail over indecent photos of children
content: Former BBC anchor Huw Edwards avoided jail time after pleading guilty to possessing indecent images of children. He was sentenced to a six-month prison term, suspended for two years, and must register as a sex offender for seven years. Edwards resigned from the BBC in April following his arrest.
summary: Former BBC anchor Huw Edwards avoided jail time after pleading guilty to possessing indecent images of children. He was sentenced to a six-month prison term, suspended for two years, and must register as a sex offender for seven years. Edwards resigned from the BBC in April following his arrest.

title: 'Trump said he was disappointed he could not finish his game'
content: Donald Trump survived a second assassination attempt during a golf game in Florida. Despite the ordeal, he humorously regretted not finishing his round. Secret Service agents identified and engaged the attacker, who fled but was later apprehended by police. Trump remained unharmed and was escorted to Mar-a-Lago. "I was even and I had a birdie putt," Donald Trump said to his friends and aides lamenting that he had been set to shoot under par.
summary: Donald Trump survived a second assassination attempt during a golf game in Florida. Despite the ordeal, he humorously regretted not finishing his round. Secret Service agents identified and engaged the attacker, who fled but was later apprehended by police. Trump remained unharmed and was escorted to Mar-a-Lago. "I was even and I had a birdie putt," Donald Trump said to his friends and aides lamenting that he had been set to shoot under par.

title: 'Trajectory is clear': Israeli defense minister signals declining hope for peaceful resolution with Hezbollah
content: Israeli defense minister Yoav Gallant informed US defense secretary Lloyd Austin that the chances for a peaceful resolution with Hezbollah are dwindling. With Hezbollah's continued alliance with Hamas, Israel aims to dismantle Hamas and ensure hostages' return. The ongoing conflict has caused significant casualties in Gaza.
summary: Israeli defense minister Yoav Gallant informed US defense secretary Lloyd Austin that the chances for a peaceful resolution with Hezbollah are dwindling. With Hezbollah's continued alliance with Hamas, Israel aims to dismantle Hamas and ensure hostages' return. The ongoing conflict has caused significant casualties in Gaza.

title: US govt knew about Ryan Routh and they...: Laura Loomer's theory on 2nd attempt to 'kill' Donald Trump
content: Laura Loomer said Ryan Routh served in the US foreign legion in Ukraine which is reportedly tied to the CIA. She said New York Times and NewsWeek interviewed him and published his profile. "So the US government knew this guy was doing illegal mercenary work and they never stopped him. Even worse, the anti-Trump Leftist media wrote glowing profiles about him and gave him a platform."
summary: Laura Loomer said Ryan Routh served in the US foreign legion in Ukraine which is reportedly tied to the CIA. She said New York Times and NewsWeek interviewed him and published his profile. "So the US government knew this guy was doing illegal mercenary work and they never stopped him. Even worse, the anti-Trump Leftist media wrote glowing profiles about him and gave him a platform."

title: Severe flooding ravages central Europe, claims at least 10 lives
content: Severe flooding has devastated central Europe, leading to at least 10 fatalities from Poland to Romania. Intense rainfall has caused towns to be submerged or damaged. The Czech-Polish border areas and eastern Romania are heavily impacted. Governments are declaring states of disaster and evacuating residents as rising rivers threaten larger cities.
summary: Severe flooding has devastated central Europe, leading to at least 10 fatalities from Poland to Romania. Intense rainfall has caused towns to be submerged or damaged. The Czech-Polish border areas and eastern Romania are heavily impacted. Governments are declaring states of disaster and evacuating residents as rising rivers threaten larger cities.

title: Andrew O'Keefe arrested for breaching bail conditions after drug overdose
content: Andrew O'Keefe, former Australian TV host, was arrested for violating bail conditions following a drug overdose. Paramedics revived him before taking him to the hospital. O'Keefe recently lost an appeal against domestic violence convictions and had previously been found guilty of assault and breaching an apprehended violence order earlier this year.
summary: Andrew O'Keefe, former Australian TV host, was arrested for violating bail conditions following a drug overdose. Paramedics revived him before taking him to the hospital. O'Keefe recently lost an appeal against domestic violence convictions and had previously been found guilty of assault and breaching an apprehended violence order earlier this year.

title: Spike in calls to poison control centers due to kids consuming energy drinks
content: US poison centers report a concerning 20% rise in calls about children consuming energy drinks in 2023, with total calls increasing to 2,834 from last year's 2,323. High caffeine content poses serious health risks for children. Both the FDA and American Academy of Pediatrics advise against consumption by children and teenagers.
summary: US poison centers report a concerning 20% rise in calls about children consuming energy drinks in 2023, with total calls increasing to 2,834 from last year's 2,323. High caffeine content poses serious health risks for children. Both the FDA and American Academy of Pediatrics advise against consumption by children and teenagers.

title: Harvest moon lunar eclipse: When and how to watch?
content: On Tuesday evening, skywatchers in the United States, Europe, Africa, western Asia, and parts of Antarctica can observe a partial lunar eclipse coinciding with a super full Moon. Known as the Harvest Moon due to its proximity to the autumnal equinox, this event will also result in King Tides. The eclipse peaks at 10:44 pm EDT.
summary: On Tuesday evening, skywatchers in the United States, Europe, Africa, western Asia, and parts of Antarctica can observe a partial lunar eclipse coinciding with a super full Moon. Known as the Harvest Moon due to its proximity to the autumnal equinox, this event will also result in King Tides. The eclipse peaks at 10:44 pm EDT.

title: Who is Gisele Pelicot? Drugged and raped for a decade, woman becomes symbol of courage and resilience
content: In France, hundreds have shown support for Gisèle Pélicot, who accused her ex-husband of drugging and facilitating her rape by strangers over ten years. The ongoing trial involves 50 men and has garnered significant attention, highlighting issues of sexual violence and consent. Pélicot's bravery has been widely praised. She has made her court case public so that people can be alerted.
summary: In France, hundreds have shown support for Gisèle Pélicot, who accused her ex-husband of drugging and facilitating her rape by strangers over ten years. The ongoing trial involves 50 men and has garnered significant attention, highlighting issues of sexual violence and consent. Pélicot's bravery has been widely praised. She has made her court case public so that people can be alerted.

title: Over 50% Americans feel Harris is the winner of presidential debate against Trump: New poll
content: According to an ABC/Ipsos poll, most Americans believe Vice President Kamala Harris won last week's presidential debate against former President Donald Trump. The survey shows 58 percent of respondents favored Harris, while only 36 percent chose Trump. The debate improved Harris's favorability ratings but had a negative impact on Trump's.
summary: According to an ABC/Ipsos poll, most Americans believe Vice President Kamala Harris won last week's presidential debate against former President Donald Trump. The survey shows 58 percent of respondents favored Harris, while only 36 percent chose Trump. The debate improved Harris's favorability ratings but had a negative impact on Trump's.

title: Philippines says 'we have not lost' South China Sea reef after pullout
content: The Philippines withdrew a coast guard ship from Sabina Shoal in the South China Sea citing damage and supply issues but insists it hasn't abandoned the area. Despite China's aggressive actions and sovereignty claims, Manila asserts the shoal remains part of its exclusive economic zone and plans continued presence.
summary: The Philippines withdrew a coast guard ship from Sabina Shoal in the South China Sea citing damage and supply issues but insists it hasn't abandoned the area. Despite China's aggressive actions and sovereignty claims, Manila asserts the shoal remains part of its exclusive economic zone and plans continued presence.

title: Donald Trump assassination attempt: What was Ryan Wesley Routh planning to do with GoPro camera?
content: Ryan Wesely Routh was arrested after an apparent assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump at his West Palm Beach golf course. The suspect, who had criticized Trump on social media and supported Ukraine, was found with a rifle and filming equipment. Authorities tracked him down with the help of a witness.
summary: Ryan Wesely Routh was arrested after an apparent assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump at his West Palm Beach golf course. The suspect, who had criticized Trump on social media and supported Ukraine, was found with a rifle and filming equipment. Authorities tracked him down with the help of a witness.

title: Shanghai slammed by strongest typhoon to hit city since 1949
content: Typhoon Bebinca hit Shanghai with gale-force winds and heavy rain, disrupting travel plans at the start of a national festival. Flights and high-speed rail services were canceled as the city initiated top-level emergency responses. The storm is expected to weaken while moving inland through Jiangsu, Zhejiang, and Anhui provinces. Hundreds of thousands of people in Shanghai and other coastal cities were evacuated.
summary: Typhoon Bebinca hit Shanghai with gale-force winds and heavy rain, disrupting travel plans at the start of a national festival. Flights and high-speed rail services were canceled as the city initiated top-level emergency responses. The storm is expected to weaken while moving inland through Jiangsu, Zhejiang, and Anhui provinces. Hundreds of thousands of people in Shanghai and other coastal cities were evacuated.

title: Pakistan: Amid worsening human rights situation, another bullet-riddled body found in Balochistan
content: A bullet-riddled body identified as Mohsin was found in Kech district, Balochistan. Originally from Mand and residing in Gomazi, Mohsin's death is part of a pattern of violence and enforced disappearances in the region. Authorities are investigating the circumstances surrounding his death.
summary: A bullet-riddled body identified as Mohsin was found in Kech district, Balochistan. Originally from Mand and residing in Gomazi, Mohsin's death is part of a pattern of violence and enforced disappearances in the region. Authorities are investigating the circumstances surrounding his death.

title: 'Doesn't sound like the man I know:' Son defends 'loving' Ryan Routh after arrest for Trump assassination attempt
content: The son of the alleged gunman who targeted former President Trump on his Florida golf course described his father as loving and caring. He expressed disbelief at the accusations, citing his father's humanitarian efforts in Ukraine. The incident involved a Secret Service agent firing shots after spotting a rifle, leading to the suspect's escape.
summary: The son of the alleged gunman who targeted former President Trump on his Florida golf course described his father as loving and caring. He expressed disbelief at the accusations, citing his father's humanitarian efforts in Ukraine. The incident involved a Secret Service agent firing shots after spotting a rifle, leading to the suspect's escape.

title: Violin in space? SpaceX Polaris Dawn creates another history, see video
content: SpaceX Polaris Dawn marked a historic moment with Sarah Gills playing the violin in space for the first time, performing "Rey's Theme" from "Star Wars." Led by Jared Isaacman, the mission also set a new altitude record for human spaceflight since NASA's Apollo missions, reaching 875 miles above Earth.
summary: SpaceX Polaris Dawn marked a historic moment with Sarah Gills playing the violin in space for the first time, performing "Rey's Theme" from "Star Wars." Led by Jared Isaacman, the mission also set a new altitude record for human spaceflight since NASA's Apollo missions, reaching 875 miles above Earth.

title: Apparent assassination attempt on Donald Trump: 10 points
content: US Secret Service agents fired at a man with an AK-style rifle near former President Donald Trump while he was golfing in Florida. The suspect fled but was later apprehended. Trump is safe, and the FBI is investigating it as an assassination attempt. President Biden and Vice President Harris have been informed.
summary: US Secret Service agents fired at a man with an AK-style rifle near former President Donald Trump while he was golfing in Florida. The suspect fled but was later apprehended. Trump is safe, and the FBI is investigating it as an assassination attempt. President Biden and Vice President Harris have been informed.

title: Shanghai on red alert as Typhoon Bebinca makes landfall, strongest in decades
content: Early Monday, Typhoon Bebinca struck Shanghai with fierce winds reaching up to 151 km/h and heavy rainfall. Authorities issued a red alert, evacuated coastal residents, and canceled numerous flights. Train services were also disrupted during the mid-Autumn Festival holiday. Popular tourist destinations like Shanghai Disney Resort have been temporarily closed.
summary: Early Monday, Typhoon Bebinca struck Shanghai with fierce winds reaching up to 151 km/h and heavy rainfall. Authorities issued a red alert, evacuated coastal residents, and canceled numerous flights. Train services were also disrupted during the mid-Autumn Festival holiday. Popular tourist destinations like Shanghai Disney Resort have been temporarily closed.
